title: Ticket #4718: Expunge deprecated my_hostname functions (IPv6 cleanup)
description:
These functions are all deprecated and replacement with the newer, better function is relatively straightforward. Do so. All are declared in /src/condor_utils/my_hostname.h and defined in /src/condor_utils/my_hostname.cpp.

my_ip_string's replacement, get_local_ipaddr, requires a condor_protocol. Look for nearby Sinfuls and condor_sockaddrs whose protocol you might need to match. If you have condor_sockaddr, use condor_sockaddr::get_protocol(). If you have a Sinful, use condor_sockaddr::from_sinful(), then get_protocol(). 

// use get_local_hostname() instead
extern	const char*	my_hostname( void );

// use get_local_fqdn() instead
extern	const char*	my_full_hostname( void );

// use get_local_ipaddr().to_ip_string() instead
extern	const char*	my_ip_string( void );

  • DONE: my_full_hostname
  • todo: my_ip_string
